metadata.title: CVE-2024-26811 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  ksmbd: validate payload size in ipc response  If installing malicious ksmbd-tools, ksmbd.mountd can return invalid ipc response to ksmbd kernel server. ksmbd should validate payload size of ipc response from ksmbd.mountd to avoid memory overrun or slab-out-of-bounds. This patch validate 3 ipc response that has payload.
